About Us

We strive to spread the science of aviation in our community!

About Us

AmadorUAVs is a club dedicated to the advancement and testing of autonomous UAV (Unmanned Aerial Vehicle) systems. We compete in a variety of both high school and collegiate level events, notably the AUVSI SUAS competition, to demonstrate the true capability of this innovative technology.

Our UAV

Ever since our club was officially established in 2018, our team has been hard at work advancing autonomous robotics and flight. Our first prototype drone was designed and built entirely by high school students.

www.AmadorUAVs.com
